title: Recap: Memory Planning System
description: Recap is an AI-powered memory planning system that simulates how the human brain learns, using layered knowledge graphs and adaptive review to help users retain information across all subjects.

title: LookAround AI
description: Talk to your AI tour guide — it walks the street, shows the world, and helps you remember what matters.

title: Zebra Giraffe Swap
description: A Stable Diffusion fine-tuning solution that swaps giraffe and zebra concepts while preserving all other learned representations through selective UNet training.

title: Binary Combinator
description: Binary Combinator is a Mathematica library that implements SK combinator constructions for binary bitwise operations, translating theoretical results into a practical, modular, and well-documented toolkit.

title: ArtifAI
description: ArtifAI helps you trace the origin of any artwork—AI-generated or human-made—while offering expert GPT-powered guidance on copyright and authorship in the age of generative AI.

title: Happy Hackers Programming Challenge
description: A rated DMOJ contest I organized and authored, featuring 6  problems ranging from CCC Senior to IOI level and attracting 200+ participants.

title: Competitive Programming Solutions
description: My solutions to problems from USACO, CCC, Codeforces, DMOJ, and other competitions.

title: Land of Gladius
description: Land of Gladius is a 3D multiplayer, open-world social game featuring multiple world scenes.

title: Forgotten Realms
description: Forgotten Realms is a 2D platform game where you control your character to reach the goal across multiple levels.

title: FeaChat
description: FeaChat is the first full-stack software I developed during COVID-19 using Python.
